channel.title: Okay fellow users i need some help
channel.description: So I'm using hamachi and i want to use just my ip address but it wont work. I have tried all of the tutorials and it just wont work. Can someone help guide me through the process of port forwarding? It would be highly appreciated

Okay if anyone else can help i need help with this type of Router is actiontech or something
